price: Ва дар ин сурат, аз пешгоҳи худ подоши бузурге ба онон медодем
arabic: وَإِذٗا لَّأٓتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّن لَّدُنَّآ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-idhan laātaynāhum min ladunnā ajran ʿaẓīman
